• Project Summary

Web app that has features to promote collaboration between. 3 main features would be, video group chat, resources for learning, person blog for showing personal achievements and to find friends that like similar things, Whiteboard that helps the session with tutor by giving them tools for communication of concepts. Promotional we will give free admin tools to the tutor, paid for by the students funding, students will also pay for the entire cloud. The student pays us and we give commission to the tutor. The tutor will receive recommendations for student blog profile matchmaking.

• Project Vision

In this section, we will discuss the business opportunity that our Online Tutoring web platform (OTweb) presents, the problem statement that our platform aims to address, our product position statement, and our SWOT analysis. Many students struggle to find the right tutor who can help them with their studies, and they often have to pay exorbitant fees for tutoring services. This can lead to poor academic performance and a lack of confidence in their abilities. Additionally, there is a need for a platform that can provide a safe and secure environment for students and tutors to connect, collaborate and learn together. Our platform aims to address these issues by providing affordable and effective tutoring services, while ensuring a secure and trustworthy online environment for all users. Our Online Tutoring web platform, OTweb, is an online platform that connects students with expert tutors for personalized one-on-one sessions. Our platform offers a wide range of features, including an online library, whiteboards for video chats, digital resources, an online collaboration solution, and a personal blog for students and tutors. Our platform offers high-quality tutoring services at affordable prices and provides a secure and trustworthy online environment for all users. Strengths: ● Our platform offers personalized one-on-one sessions with expert tutors. ● Our platform provides a wide range of features that aid the education process. ● Our platform provides a secure and trustworthy online environment. ● Our platform offers affordable prices for tutoring services. Weaknesses: ● Our platform may not have a large customer base initially, as it is a new platform. ● Our platform may face stiff competition from established players in the online tutoring market. Opportunities: ● There is a growing demand for online tutoring services. ● Our platform can expand globally to reach a larger customer base.

• Project/Business Requirements

• Project Plan

Instant help for students who need help, with tutors available online: tutor connection who is online, a menu

Online Library, where students could read pdf. ex) helpful techniques for students and tutor, How to build good habits for students

Whiteboards to facilitate video chat: drawing tools ex) shapes, pencil, photos(textbook page img)

Personal User Blog: Blog post (text),post profile pic, show website achievements, find others with similar courses.

Digital Library for students to access their notes

• Requirements Analysis and Design

The purpose of this document is to present a detailed information of the Online Tutoring web. It will explain the purpose and features of the application, interfaces of the app, what the app will do, constraints under which it must operate and how the app will respond to external uses. This Document is intended for stakeholders and the developers of this app. This software will be Online Tutoring web for students who need help with their homework projects. This application will be designed to maximize the students productivity and education potential by providing tools to get help for online homework assignments as well as give tutors more flexibility to work on helping students with their homework. This software will facilitate communication with tutors and students through video chat, email and chat support. This software will also have admin page for administrators to modify this application as well.
